extendedInfo.description: Chegg, the Student Hub, has your books and solutions on the go! Free instant access to your Chegg textbooks*, read your eTextbooks, find guided solutions, and Get 2 FREE guided solutions each week.Features:â¢ Free 7-day instant access to your Chegg textbooks* rented on the webâ¢ Tap into our library of over 2.5 million guided solutionsâ¢ Read eTextbooks on any device â desktop, tablet, or smartphoneExclusive Feature:â¢ 2 FREE guided solutions each week**Coming soon** Textbook rental & purchase (available now at chegg.com)Free eTextbook previews**When availableFor bug reports or general feedback, email us to appfeedback@chegg.com or tweet @Chegg #androidapp

reviews.title: Dislike!
reviews.comment: Wont let me use it on mobile. Keeps tellin me to log in and pay and I already have. And why cant I get even numbers?if not possible shoulda said that somewhere. One star until I can log in!
reviews.author: Peyton Mackey

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I can have access to my textbooks on my phone now! And it works well! The text is clear and I have no problem reading. Hopefully you will add Nexus 7 support soon!
reviews.author: Lynette Barrera

reviews.title: Can\'t Use Facebook Login
reviews.comment: I\'ve got all of my books tied to my Facebook account, which I use to login on the desktop website. However, when I use it to login to the mobile app, it authorizes Chegg on Facebook\'s end but then it tells me that I have an invalid email or password. Fix ASAP!
reviews.author: Quinn Murphy

reviews.title: Ummm
reviews.comment: So its very slow actually. Using a nexus 7 4.3 2nd gen. Another issue is, I have only two eBooks, one for auto shop and the other for algebra. Why is it that 20% of the time I select a book to read and I get biology, calculus and government books? I didn\'t purchase those books and I have full access to them. Next issue, I expect to pick up where I left off but that is never the case. Its always 23 pages ahead of where I left off. So this app bugs me alot
reviews.author: Mickey Valentine

reviews.title: Rip off
reviews.comment: I already pay for a chegg account and this  app wants me to  pay for  a different  account. I am not  paying  to  have the  same access.
reviews.author: Melissa Student

reviews.title: Does not show answers
reviews.comment: So yeah great I fond my book, look solutions and they are all empty... I expand and nothing happens.
reviews.author: Roberto Araya

reviews.title: Won\'t allow me to log in at all
reviews.comment: I purchased two ebooks for class and it wont even let me log into the app using my username/password or even the facebook login, super frustrating
reviews.author: Ruben Lorta

reviews.title: Won\'t load solutions.
reviews.comment: It worked great the first few days. Now the app won\'t load the problem solutions. The app will log me in but not allow the step by step solution to display.
reviews.author: Tokyo PoliceClub

reviews.title: Works fine for the most part
reviews.comment: But when I search for textbooks on my phone the covers don\'t show up. They show up fine on my tablet.
reviews.author: Jordana Lewis

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Stops showing solutions after little use. What am I paying the annual fee for?
reviews.author: Harrison Baker

reviews.title: Pointless
reviews.comment: Never ever works. Can never read my book
reviews.author: Maria Zendejas

reviews.title: The best of the worse
reviews.comment: All I got for my book is !oops something went wrong ....!
reviews.author: Herold Boursiquot

reviews.title: Crashes after opening step three on hw help
reviews.comment: Like the title says. Parts one and two work, part three or later won\'t open and crashes app
reviews.author: Evan Holbert

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Load
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t Load.
reviews.author: Mark Ottolia

reviews.title: Can\'t access solutions
reviews.comment: I paid for an annual hw help membership and it tells me \"you have used your free solutions, come back in 7 days to unlock 2 more\". It worked fine until I updated. Please fix
reviews.author: Brian Mixon

reviews.comment: I have bought a history book online and when it shows up on my app and I click it, it will not pull it up. I have the book America 9th edition Volume 1 on an HTC Rhyme
reviews.author: Taylor Wilkinson

reviews.title: Nothing Happens
reviews.comment: When I launch the program I get a welcome screen then nothing happens. Thank goodness I didn\'t rent my books through them I would have no way to access them.  Needs lots of work. I\'m using a Samsung Galaxy II tablet.
reviews.author: Sandy Bricker

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work on my galaxy note 10.1 tablet. Very upset since I already bought an ebook with them!
reviews.author: Josh Boyd

reviews.title: Yay
reviews.comment: Works great on my GS3 now to find out about my Nexus 7. Now that you have this app I\'m way more likely to rent digitally!!! Which is what I want!
reviews.author: Mandy Herr

reviews.title: Un-im- pressed
reviews.comment: Its a good functional app itself. Everything works as it should.  The below are mentioned as potential bugs in the system, listed by other users.   I\'d also like it to be integrated with \"Coursera\" so that I may view the book I\'m studying on my tablet.   That would be quite awesome as a laptop is not always accessible in many situations
reviews.author: Kirill Iakounitchev
